ygData.subject: Re: Fighting in Kith (Was guise thread)
ygData.msgSnippet: Fflam is too too something!  So Fflamson it is.  Call me unimaginative.  My first RPG.  But I read these great books as a kid, and Fflewduer was a kind of
ygData.messageBody:
Fflam is too too something! So Fflamson it is. Call me unimaginative. My
first RPG. But I read these great books as a kid, and Fflewduer was a kind
of silly bard that had noble roots (King of a small realm). I wanted my
bard to be like that. All derring do and loyalty to the hilt. So I chose
that name for my bard.

When starting a game like EQ, I was confronted with choices covering race,
class, sex, stats, and name. I figured I wanted to be a bard because they
could do so many things and I didn't have a clear idea of what to get out of
EQ. I chose as best I could the most general of possiblities so not to
limit myself. A half elf gets to start in 3 different towns, a bard can do
most quests, I spread my points around not knowing too much, but skimping on
Charisma (only 5 points there).

Anyway there you have it. BTW, it is possible to use several different
email services that don't have my name in the email, but why hide? I like
me. I like my bard. I have a good time. I play the game like I live, with
honor and a sense of humor.

Fflewduer Fflamson (Arctic Lords) Cazic-Thule Server
AKA Thomas Edwin Henschel




>
>According to the illustrious Tom Henschel...
>:)Fflewduer
>
>Your last name wouldn't be Fflam, would it?
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
><< text3.html >>
